import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom" function SignupForm({user, setUser, existingUser, setExistingUser}) { const navigate = useNavigate(); function handleSignupChange(e) { setUser(prevUser => ({ ...prevUser, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) setExistingUser((prev) => ({ ...prev, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } function submitHandler(event) { event.preventDefault() console.log(existingUser) navigate("/welcome") } function handleKeyPress(e) { if (e.key === 'Enter') { console.log(existingUser) navigate("/welcome") } } return (
) } export default SignupForm
